open.title: Vumatel Reach Outage | Mandeni
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Mandeni, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.
